snippet.title: 4 Years of Game Development in Unity | Devlog #0
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2164820/Eons_Away

In this devlog, I'll showcase my four-year progress and reveal future plans. Feel free to share questions or suggestions below. Thank you for watching!

Eons Away
------------------
Twitter: https://twitter.com/EonsAwayGame
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/eonsawaygame
Support me on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/EonsAway

Please subscribe, like and turn on notifications if you enjoyed the video!

Chapters
------------------
0:00 - Overview
0:26 - Intro
1:33 - The Journey Begins
2:15 - A New Direction
3:32 - Battle Mechanics
4:50 - Playtesting
5:19 - Recent changes
7:15 - Goals
7:40 - Outro


#devlog #unity2d #indiedev #gamedev #indiegame #gamedevelopment #devlog #madewithunity #rpg #cozygames
